page.title: 15Social Life and the Tavern.
page.content: The social hub of the community is the Tavern.Recently the area has been altered to accomodate the Stores at one end and to provide a meeting place which is always open -even when the bar is closed.In a newly created gallery above the bar section there are restaurant facilities. In the 1960's there were 2 fruit machines but happily these have now gone.There is a pool table above the Stores.Barbecues and other events tend to be impromptu. At Christmas a service is held in the Tavern and a Christmas dinner. In 1984 a small brewery was started. It usually produces'2 barrel brews' which is 72 gallons a time.The main product is Puffin Ale (sometimes known as Puffin's Purge).The distinctive taste and other qualities probably derive from the peaty water.
